## habitat destruction of benthic structures

[hd_benstr](https://github.com/OHI-Science/mhi/blob/master/region2017/layers/)

Benthic structures were defined as manmade features in the offshore environment that disrupt benthic habitat and include moored buoys, channel markers, offshore cables and pipelines.

### Reference

[Ocean Tipping Points](http://www.pacioos.hawaii.edu/projects/oceantippingpoints/#data)
